item.title: X lets you edit DMs — here is how to use the feature
item.description:
X, the social network owned by Elon Musk, is finally rolling out one of the most sought-after features for direct messages: the ability to edit the message. Over the weekend, X made the edit message feature available to iOS users. One of the engineers at the company posted about the roll-out and said the edit […]

item.title: Huawei will launch a tri-fold smartphone with 10-inch display next week - 9to5Google
item.description: Huawei will launch a tri-fold smartphone with 10-inch display next week  9to5GoogleView Full Coverage on Google News

item.title: Elon Musk's X is now banned in Brazil
item.description: Brazil's top court just banned Elon Musk's social media platform X from the country.

item.title: No, the black Facebook app icon isn't a new logo. Here's why you're seeing it.
item.description: The Facebook app logo changed to black and blue for some users, but it's just a glitch.

item.title: Spotify calls out Apple for removing volume control for connected devices
item.description: Spotify users can no longer control audio volume using iPhone's physical buttons when streaming to an audio device.
